title: Lost bookmarks with browser update
content: Hi My browser updated to latest version 100.0.1 but all my opened tabs are missing. And what is more important all my sync bookmarks are also gone. I can note restore any of sync data.
creator: robert.ryczek

title: i cannot get ABC iview and stan etc. since updating??
content: Tell me how to fix this. As I had all my movie and TV apps easily available before I updated.
creator: wendyrew

title: Windows folder shown in Group-By when opened from Firefox
content:
Hi All

I disabled the group-by option everywhere in my Win 11 home. Now I can open any folder and avoid that useless feature... except if I open the download folder from Firefox.

Details: - if I open my Downloads folder from the desktop shortcut I get it normal (no group-by) - if I click the folder icon close to the downloaded file in Firefox Library/Downloads window, then the windows folder is shown with Group-by enabled - the same happens if I click the folder icon close to the downloaded file in Firefox's download toolbar icon

Does this happen to others? Thank you Stefano
creator: steluci

title: digital signatur
content: my digital signature cannot work in the new edition - as I am always preferring Mozilla instead of Chrome, I would like you to fix that very soon. I have several companies and several signatures which i need to use every day, I am not happy that I am forced to use Chrome :(
creator: sanne3

title: Getting access denied, looks like website is perceiving me as someone suspicious.
content: I tried to log in to my bank and it says "access denied." I may have changed a setting or something on Firefox or my VPN. I'm confused, am not very computer savvy. I went to Apple store last weekend for phone and they said I should use Safari for info security, so I made that default on my Mac Mini (where I'm writing now) for a couple days, but then got blocked from a website where I plan to apply for a job, so I went back to Firefox, after I read articles saying that Firefox is more secure. I am using a VPN, so is that part of the problem ? (shouldn't be, because I have had that for a year or so). I don't know what to do, and it is after 12:45 am now, and I have to go to bed, have to get up for work in 6 hours. I hope someone has some help for me when I log in tomorrow. I hope that I have not been hacked. Thanks for reading!
creator: brianarc1

title: firefox slows down- randomly
content:
I've been using Firefox for over 10 years. Slows down to a halt. It happens when opening a new tab or googling. I hit enter and it stops working. I've reinstalled FF3 times and it keeps failing. 

I have virus protection and I'm running it without firewall. I'm on windows 10.

Thanks for any help.

Marcos
creator: Oblomurg

title: When reading "Daily Mail" I keep getting "An error has occurred, please try again later Error code 200"  on firefox.
content: When reading "Daily Mail" I keep getting "An error has occurred, please try again later Error code 200" on firefox.'

title: Firefox isn't loading google fonts on macbook pro and iMac
content:
Hi. I've been having this problem with my iMac for sometime, but now it's affecting my Macbook Pro, as well. Both machines are 2015, running OS 10.15.7.

They have problems loading webfonts (I get the annoying question marks). I tried creating a new test user, and the issue persisted. Any ideas on what I should do?

Thanks!
creator: jack108

title: Firefox "hangs" (freezes)
content: In the past week or so, Firefox has unexpectedly "frozen" and does not respond. I have not loaded any new programs during this period. The only way I can get Firefox to run is to end all the Firefox processes in Task Manager and restart it. I also noticed that there are usually 9 firefox processes running in Task Manager.
creator: jathom1
